comments:

Created an attachment (id=44763)
Replace indexOf() with lastIndexOf() when parsing the handle

Created an attachment (id=44842)
Test case that triggers exception

Nice work Steffen, test cases like this make patches very easy to apply.

One thing I'm curious about is why you would have had a task with a URL in the handle that wasn't a subtype of AbstractRepositoryTask?
For some reason (some mock up with the externalizer I guess) all tasks in my tasklist.xml were "converted" to <Task/> elements so Task objects were used with Trac urls that contained a "-".

Yes, this was a very bad bug with the mock externalizer that was in CVS from Friday afternoon until Sunday.  I actually had to restore my tasklist from one of the automatic backups because I work out of head.  I removed the mock externalizer for now and will look into making the externalization defensive to borken externalizers.  I assume that this didn't break that tasklist that you work with, or do you work boostrapped?
I have to admit that I am not yet working bootstrapped. Therefore I only lost the tasklist in my testing environment which I didn't matter at all.
Ooops, neglected to assign to you.
